content.query:
USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW tsc_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_overview_Oneyear
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/aggregate/parquet/Extended_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_overview_OneYear.parquet/*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
